name: Jester Boy
description:
Jester Boy

Help Jester Boy escape this dungeon of almost never ending nothingness. Hold D or the Right Arrow for a couple hours to get to the end in this badly put together unity project.

I made this thing a while ago but I really like his walk cycle, so I'm releasing it.

When I opened this project every single block had a collider on it so that pretty much sums up 2017 Miko.
